entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
